name: Bakery Biz Tycoon
detailed_description:
Bakery Biz Tycoon is a typical oldschool tycoon game. The player must become the entrepreneur and manage his company to dominate the market but also to be careful not to overinvest and stay on the market.

The player has at his disposal many game mechanics that give many functions and tools to manage his company. The player must skilfully balance between investing in the development of production capacity, manage the production itself, control the warehouse space, but also take care of sales supported by marketing activities.

The products created by the player will take part in various competitions, and their result may affect the assessment of products against the competition by customers which may positively or negatively affect the sales volume.



Finally, 3 cities where the player will be able to expand their number of stores
Expansion of production capacity and production management
Warehouse management so that you can use your warehouses in the most efficient way.
Store management to increase the number of products available for sale and support the same level of service
The player can create products with specific parameters, thanks to which the player has an influence on the production costs and on the product's opinion
Opportunity to participate in events such as Regional Competitions for the best product in the industry, in which the player's product will compete with products from other manufacturers.

A Few Words From the Author


By creating Bakery Biz Tycoon, my main goal was to create a title that will relate to old school tycoon games. In which the player has to focus more on the macro of managing the enterprise than on micro-management or time management. I tried to create a more complex production than typical Time Management games, but simple enough for the time spent with Bakery Biz Tycoon to be fun. And I wish all this and I hope that my first game will give you at least a few hours of pleasant gameplay. Greetings my freinds! :)
